name: Friendsoup

Thank you to the whole Soup’s on! team and special thanks to Wholesome Games!

I sure am hungry for Friendsoup! After a frightening shipwreck, save your cute veggie friends from the cold depths of the ocean by launching them into a warm cozy bowl of Friendsoup! 

:)
